HomeCourses.title: Courses
HomeCourses.description: We offer a variety of courses to help you learn web development and design.

Items.title: Frontend Development
Items.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern websites.
Items.secoundDescription: Explore server-side programming with Node.js and databases to create dynamic web applications.
Items.thirdDescription: Master both frontend and backend development to create full-stack web applications.
Items.fourthDescription: Learn how to promote your website through social media platforms.
Items.fifthDescription: Learn English language from the basics to the advanced level.
Items.sixthDescription: Learn how to design user-friendly and visually appealing websites.

coursesHero.title: Advance your skills with our courses
coursesHero.description: Join our expert-led courses to master web development, design, and digital marketing. Whether you're a beginner or looking to upskill, we have the right course for you.

CoursesItems.currentDescription: We offer a wide range of courses designed to help you master web development and design from scratch to completion
CoursesItems.title: Explore Our Course for Web Design
CoursesItems.description: Our web design course covers the latest trends and techniques in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites.
CoursesItems.largeDescription: Our courses are designed to provide you with the knowledge and skills you need to succeed in the ever-changing landscape of web development, design, and digital marketing. With a focus on practical, hands-on learning, our courses cover topics such as web development frameworks, design principles, and digital marketing strategies. Whether you're looking to upskill or reskill, our courses are the perfect way to take your career to the next level.
CoursesItems.secoundTitle: Explore Our Course for Web Development
CoursesItems.secoundDescription: Our web development course covers the latest technologies and best practices for building dynamic and responsive websites.
CoursesItems.secoundLargeDescription: Our courses are taught by industry experts with years of experience in their fields. They'll share their knowledge and insights with you, providing you with a comprehensive understanding of the latest trends and technologies. With our courses, you'll gain the skills and confidence you need to succeed in your career, whether you're just starting out or looking to take your skills to the next level. Plus, with our flexible online learning platform, you can learn at your own pace and on your own schedule.
CoursesItems.thirdTitle: Explore Our Course for Backend Development
CoursesItems.thirdDescription: Our backend development course covers the server-side programming and databases required for building robust and scalable web applications.
CoursesItems.thirdLargeDescription: By taking our courses, you'll not only gain new skills and knowledge, but also become part of a community of like-minded professionals who are passionate about web development, design, and digital marketing. Our courses include interactive discussions, peer feedback, and support from our instructors, so you can connect with others who share your interests and goals. Plus, with our certificate of completion, you'll have a tangible way to showcase your skills to employers and clients.
CoursesItems.fourthDescription: Our SMM course covers the latest techniques and tools for promoting your website on social media platforms.
CoursesItems.fourthLargeDescription: We're committed to helping you achieve your career goals, and we're confident that our courses will provide you with the skills and knowledge you need to succeed. That's why we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the course, we'll refund your tuition in full. Plus, with our lifetime access to course materials, you can review and refresh your skills at any time. Invest in your future with our courses, and start building the career you deserve.
CoursesItems.fifthTitle: Explore Our Course for Full-Stack Development
CoursesItems.fifthDescription: Our full-stack development course covers the end-to-end development process, including both frontend and backend development.
CoursesItems.fifthLargeDescription: Don't just take our word for it - our courses have helped thousands of students achieve their career goals and improve their skills. Here's what some of our students have to say: 'I was able to land my dream job after taking this course!' 'The instructor was knowledgeable and provided great feedback.' 'I loved the interactive discussions and peer feedback.' Read more testimonials from our satisfied students and see how our courses can help you achieve your goals.
CoursesItems.sixthTitle: Explore Our Course for English Language
CoursesItems.sixthDescription: Our English language course covers the fundamentals of language learning and communication.
CoursesItems.sixthLargDescription: Take your English skills to the next level with our comprehensive course. Covering topics from beginner to advanced, our lessons include interactive exercises,our course is designed to help you achieve your goals.
CoursesItems.seventhTitle: Explore Our Course for Graphic Design
CoursesItems.seventhDescription: Our graphic design course covers the latest trends and techniques for creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites.
CoursesItems.seventhLargDescription: Unlock your creativity and master the art of visual communication with our comprehensive graphic design course. Learn essential design principles, industry-standard tools, and practical techniques to create stunning graphics for web and print. Through hands-on projects, expert feedback, and a supportive learning community, you'll build a professional portfolio and gain the confidence to pursue a successful career in graphic design.

1.itemOne: Learn the fundamentals of color theory, typography, and layout.
1.itemTwo: Work on real-world projects to build your portfolio.
1.itemThree: Get feedback from experienced designers and instructors.

2.itemOne: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript from the ground up.
2.itemTwo: Build interactive and responsive web pages.
2.itemThree: Understand version control and modern development workflows.

3.itemOne: Learn the basics of React and state management.

4.itemOne: Understand the fundamentals of social media marketing and its role in growing a business.
4.itemTwo: Develop strategies for creating engaging content and building an online community.
4.itemThree: Analyze social media metrics to optimize campaigns and measure success.

5.itemOne: Combine frontend and backend skills to build complete web applications.
5.itemTwo: Deploy and maintain your projects using modern tools.
5.itemThree: Collaborate on group projects and build a professional portfolio.

6.itemOne: Learn the fundamentals of English grammar, vocabulary, and communication skills.
6.itemTwo: learn English language from the basics to the advanced level.
6.itemThree: turn around your speaking and writing skills.

7.itemOne: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design and its applications.
7.itemTwo: Work on real-world projects to build your portfolio.
7.itemThree: Get feedback from experienced designers and instructors.

AboutHero.title: Welcome to IT
AboutHero.description: . Founded in 2019, our company has been serving the Armenian market by providing a range of services and educating hundreds of young people. Over the years, our team has developed websites, delivered marketing services, and organized courses in web programming, SMM, graphic design, robotics, and more.Our mission is to combine technology and education to equip the new generation with practical skills and opportunities to be competitive both in the Armenian and international markets.At Welcome to IT, we believe that everyone can build their future in the right educational environment with the support of experienced professionals.

AboutWhoWeAre.title: Our goal is focused
AboutWhoWeAre.description: We are dedicated to delivering exceptional web solutions that help businesses succeed online.
AboutWhoWeAre.secoundDescription: We constantly evolve our processes and technologies to stay ahead in the digital landscape.

Items.planningDescription: We start with a detailed analysis of your requirements and create a comprehensive project plan.
Items.conceptionDescription: We develop innovative concepts that align with your brand and business objectives.
Items.designDescription: We create visually appealing and user-friendly designs that enhance your brand identity.

SingleProjectHero.title: About the project to study
SingleProjectHero.description: Explore our detailed case studies to understand how we transform business requirements into successful digital solutions.

1.description: Our e-commerce solution provides a seamless shopping experience with advanced features for product management, secure payments, and customer engagement.

2.description: The barber shop website combines elegant design with practical booking functionality to enhance customer experience.

3.description: Our furniture store platform offers an immersive shopping experience with 3D product visualization and easy navigation.

4.description: The gaming website features an engaging interface with interactive elements and smooth performance.

5.description: The photo studio website showcases professional work with a clean, elegant design and easy portfolio navigation.

6.description: The plastering website contains a professional showcase of services, easy navigation and contact options.

7.description: The construction website presents professional services, project gallery and easy contact options.
